author: Axios
title: Boris Johnson moved out of intensive care but remains in hospital with coronavirus
description: U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been moved out of intensive care but is continuing to be monitored at St. Thomas' Hospital in London, according to a Downing Street spokesperson. Why it matters: It's a sign of improvement after Johnson spent three nights…
content:
